messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I have very few rules dont break laws and get high as fuck those are my rules

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: TO DAY IS AN AMAZING DAY WE HAVE THE FIRST EVER MONKEY TO BECOME HOS CONGRATS JIMBO

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: WE GOT A NINJA ON BOARD BOIS GET READY

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: So you know jimbo I didnt betray you I planned to give you botany access so you could grow your own bananas that way you had the freshest and best of the best

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Mothball. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: THE CAPTAIN'S TYRANY HAS BEEN STOPPED! REJOICE!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to the heroic actions of your Space Station, a worthy shuttle has been sent. LONG LIVE FREEDOM!

messages.author: Zork Hall (Shaft Miner)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">Jimbo is a cheap knockoff of Harambe, and the great ninja is going to save us from it.</font>
